en: Understanding and love will guide you
White dove flies over the village, carrying my sorrowful soul
hu: Fehér galamb száll a falu felett, viszi az én bánatos lelkemet

en: It was already late into the night when something woke me up.
The city smelled like piss and sweat.
People were ready to sell their junk. You just had to name your price.
Would you mind picking up the phone, mister? Maybe they are ringing for you.
